metadata.description: Letter from Secretary of National Defense and Communications Basilio Valdes to Budget and Finance Commissioner Ismael Mathay regarding assignment orders of postal employees as recommended and issued by the Acting Post Office Inspector of Leyte
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; letters; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
metadata.title: Letter from Basilio Valdes to Ismael Mathay regarding assignment orders of postal employees as recommended and issued by the Acting Post Office Inspector of Leyte
